markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Precious](/Traits.aspx?ID=673)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 332 <sup>2.0</sup>

Valuable materials with special properties have the precious trait. They can be substituted for base materials when you Craft items.
name: Precious
